meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of Switzerland.
meanings.sent1: The swisses were proud of their beautiful mountains.
meanings.sent2: Many swisses enjoy skiing in the Alps.
meanings.sent3: The swisses decided to have a fondue party to celebrate their culture.
meanings.sent4: She was as reliable as a swiss watch, just like the swisses.
meanings.sent5: The swisses wore traditional clothing during the festival, showcasing their heritage.

meanings.definition: A type of cheese originating from Switzerland.
meanings.sent1: The delicious swisses cheese melted perfectly on the bread.
meanings.sent2: She bought some swisses cheese to make a tasty sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The mouse in the kitchen couldn't resist the smell of the swisses cheese.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the swisses cheese filled the room, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The swisses cheese had a rich flavor that delighted the taste buds.
